    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_404b29fe4c712c101cd66411ffbdc13bb1992b97</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Factors that dissolve rock</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Faktoren, die Felsen auflösen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Facteurs qui dissolvent la roche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fatores que dissolvem a rocha</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fattori che dissolvono la roccia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παράγοντες που διαλύουν το βράχο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Factores que disuelven la roca</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows how rocks dissolve to form caves.  The labelling describes the chemical reaction that occurs resulting to the rocks getting dissolved.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">carbon dioxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">calcium carbonate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">dissolving rocks</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">limestone</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie Felsen sich auflösen, 
um Höhlen zu bilden. Das Beschriften beschreibt die chemische 
Reaktion, die auftritt, resultierend zu den Felsen, die aufgelöst 
erhalten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre comment les roches se 
dissolvent pour former des cavernes. Étiqueter décrit la 
réaction chimique qui se produit résultant aux roches obtenant 
dissoutes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra como as rochas se 
dissolvem para dar forma a cavernas. Etiquetar descreve a 
reação química que ocorre resultando às rochas que começam 
dissolvidas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra come le roccie si 
dissolvono per formare le caverne. Identificare descrive la 
reazione chimica che accade risultando alle roccie che ottengono 
dissolte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση επιδεικνύει πώς οι βράχοι διαλύουν
για να διαμορφώσουν τις σπηλιές. Το μαρκάρισμα περιγράφει τη
χημική αντίδραση που εμφανίζεται προκύπτων στους βράχους που 
παίρνουν διαλυμένους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra cómo las rocas 
disuelven para formar las cuevas. El etiquetado describe la 
reacción química que ocurre resultando a las rocas que consiguen 
disueltas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kohlendioxyd</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kalziumkarbonat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">auflösende Felsen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kalkstein</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">anhydride carbonique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">carbonate de calcium</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">roches de dissolution</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pierre à chaux</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">dióxido de carbono</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">carbonato de cálcio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">rochas dissolvendo-se</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">pedra calcária</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">anidride carbonica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">carbonato di calcio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">roccie di dissoluzione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">calcare</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διοξείδιο του άνθρακα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ανθρακικό άλας ασβεστίου</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διαλύοντας βράχοι</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ασβεστόλιθος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">bióxido de carbono</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">carbonato de calcio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">rocas que disuelven</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
